html:
11.2.23  11:37 pm   Summarize the bible in 9 words

      jesus goes on an adventure. choose your own ending

11.2.23  11:27 pm   tips are often directed towards beginners of something, but do you have any tips for experts?

      only if i become aware of something i think you could improve. so far you haven't told me about any problems, nor have i seen any problems with anything you are doing. so for now i have to assume you're doing fine

11.2.23  10:52 pm   what's something you always have in your pocket that isn't your phone or wallet?

      another pocket

11.2.23  10:44 pm   when you finish these 15 videos, will you move onto working on a batch of 15 more videos?

      i'm not necessarily working on 15 videos, but either way there's a lot of videos and songs coming up. doing my life's work here. that's just the way it is

11.2.23  10:19 pm   does anyone have any idea what they're doing

      occasionally

11.2.23  10:15 pm   whats your most esteemed currency

      honesty

11.2.23  9:44 pm   Have you ever had a crunchy night of sleep?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.2.23  9:43 pm   why do songwriters always save the best for christmas

      that's when it's needed most. it's the darkest hour. this predates the existence of christmas by the way

11.2.23  9:35 pm   thoughts on free will?

     it has insane implications for the fabric of reality. conveniently, there happen to indeed be some weird ass things about the fabric of reality that seem to need something precisely like free will to justify them

     it's weird that we can do kind of anything but not really

     yes really. if we couldn't do anything, then, ........ we wouldn't have done anything

11.2.23  8:28 pm   i've been working with the chromatic scale. my strategy is to let every note feel loved, and also to use the piano to lead the rhythm. it sounds very janky and awkward and dissonant, but there was a brief moment where i could hum each note before i played it at a not-very-fast place. i think i want to be able to do that faster: predict each note before i play it. but i wonder if my answer lies in intervals...

     almost any exercise you can think of is probably good, but also be sure to balance that out with a lot of fun and good times

      i saw a few charts where they didn't specify the key of the song but the note of the scale like so: 1 5 5 2 1 1. how would that work for the chromstic scale? it wouldn't, right?

     usually what you'd do is use flats or shartps to show how it deviates from a major scale. so for example, 1, #2, 2, b3, 3, 4, #4, 5, #5, 6, b7, 7, 1 and of course for any of those flat/sharps you can choose between which way you want to do it (#4 or b5) depending on which one you prefer at that time

     when i was playing with the form of My Favorite Things (by ear, at first), i found that i could be a lot freer with the melody than i wanted. but i don't know what to do.
actually i don't want to predict each note before i play it. i want to play the note that i predict. this is my main struggle currently. beyond technique and all.

     i think you are doing fine. the brain cannot do otherwise than learn. over time, it almost doesn't matter what the strategy is. the learning happens. except don't forget the most important ingredient in music: fun

11.2.23  8:15 pm   did you do a barrel roll yet?

      no, but i will

11.2.23  7:58 pm   can there be such a thing as a cluster of a cloud of clusters of clouds of clusters of...

      i'd assume so

11.2.23  6:40 pm   Where did you learn those chords

      on the keyboard

11.2.23  4:09 pm   whats your opinion on electrons?

      too small. can't find them

11.2.23  3:51 pm   how do i convince my bosses to stop scheduling me so many fucking hours so i can have time to work on personal projects without telling them that that's what i'm doing in my free time ( they decided to make me full time without asking me and then a bunch of people quit so now we're short staffed and i'd feel bad but i don't have anyone i can ask to work there with me)

      it's possible you could just start looking for another job

11.2.23  3:28 pm   is there an aesthetic you like that isn't in your music?

     sure

       if so, what is it?

     colors

11.2.23  2:27 pm   how can i get a notification when you update this page

      if you want to give me your email i can email you personally each time i update it. it won't be an automated notification, i'll just send you a reminder personally

11.2.23  2:16 pm   When I am playing piano, I tend to gravitate towards similar chords/chord progressions and it ends up feeling same-y. Do you have any tips for getting more creative and interesting with it? 

      sure. start playing all the things you've never played, in order

11.2.23  2:15 pm   Do you have any opinion about November?

      it's simultaneously the most cozy and least cozy month. it's actually kind of intimidating

11.2.23  1:27 pm   What's a question you'd really like to be asked?

      something i didn't ask you to ask

11.2.23  12:48 pm   If I walked from Kosciuszko street to the Jamaica station, what would I pass along the way? 

      likely Forest Park

11.2.23  12:22 pm   ayo the pizza here!

      it most certainly is

11.2.23  10:19 am   What do you think of Italy?

      easy to get lost there

11.2.23  10:07 am   If the world doesn't feel real how can I be sure I really exist

      if you're wondering that, that's all it takes. you exist

11.2.23  9:50 am   I sell refrigerators. Do you understand?

      almost

11.2.23  7:36 am   is christmas in a week

      it's started already but it lasts much longer than a week

11.2.23  6:34 am   how does the question answering page look like?

     it looks really really good

     and do you think that perhaps one day you, me, and the person that asked the question above could say "racoon rock" at the same time?

      i doubt it

11.2.23  6:04 am   your music sounds like someone played instruments

      fair enough

11.2.23  5:06 am   i did ask a question can i know what will happen next

      in this case, i will answer it

11.2.23  3:05 am   are we friends?

      almost

11.1.23  10:55 pm   Have you consumed substances that some countries dislike?

      i assume i have

11.1.23  10:35 pm   Do you think other people can see me 

      usually

11.1.23  10:14 pm   I'm evil are you evil too?

      no

11.1.23  9:35 pm   What is the worst month?

      statistically it's january

11.1.23  9:13 pm   Fun fact: There is a song you used to love at one point in your life, that you listened to at a certain point and then never listened to again. Does realizing that make you want to listen to old music you liked?

      yes

11.1.23  9:12 pm   Is there a lore to your videos, or are they disconnected?

      i don't know what lore means, but the connection is that i made them all, without even dying in between

11.1.23  8:28 pm   Does Mother Nature bleed leaves

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.1.23  8:24 pm   Do you remember that time you stacked all the books and put some detergent on top?

     yes

     Would you say that was a formative experience?

     yes

     Would you recommend it to others 

     yes, but not with the exact items i used. for your equivalent of that same exercise you must use the items that are already there in the room. that's the point

     not exactly

      If so, what is your favorite dish with them?

      friets

      i didn't have a halloween

11.1.23  4:25 pm   ive been going through something

      i understand

      sometimes

     sure

     what do you do

     enjoy

      sorry which apples

      i'm not sure

11.1.23  12:31 pm   how many vowels do you know

      about 20

11.1.23  11:26 am   What is home?

      i'm not sure

11.1.23  8:58 am   how are capybaras so peaceful. what is their secret

      i'm not sure. they are so peaceful i've never even heard of them

11.1.23  8:44 am   If an idea comes up at a time where you cannot process it, do you write it down or do you convince yourself to remember it and forget anyways?

      if you like it, write it down

11.1.23  8:34 am   What happens when a moveable object comes in contact with a stoppable force?

      a physical contest plays out, as to whether or not the moveable object was more moveable than the stoppable force was stoppable. the difference between those 2 strengths will determine the results of the collision
